instructions: On supported models , tap the screen or raise iPhone to wake it, then glance at your iPhone. The lock icon animates from closed to open to indicate that iPhone is unlocked. Swipe up from the bottom of the screen.
Tap Calendars at the bottom of the screen. Tap Add Calendar. Type a name for the new calendar, then tap Done.

Tap Calendars at the bottom of the screen. Tap the Info button next to the iCloud calendar you want to share. Tap Add Person, then enter a name or email address, or tap the Add button to browse your Contacts. Tap Add.
Tap Calendars, tap the Info button next to the shared calendar, then tap the person s name. Do any of the following: Turn on or off Allow Editing. Tap Stop Sharing.

Tap Calendars, then tap the Info button next to the iCloud calendar you want to share. Turn on Public Calendar, then tap Share Link to copy or send the URL for your calendar. Choose a method for sending the URL Message, Mail, and so on.
Tap Calendars at the bottom of the screen. Tap the Info button next to the iCloud calendar you want to delete. Tap Delete Calendar at the bottom of the list.
